message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value and your interest, I believe we can reach a fair agreement. I propose a price of $9,500 for the product.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your interest in selling to me. However, I'm looking to spend no more than $10,000. Would you be willing to come down to $9,800?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I am willing to meet you halfway between my initial offer and your counteroffer. Therefore, I propose a price of $9,650 for the product.
